name: eCARDZ TECHNOLOGY
overview:
Established in the year 2012, we, “ECARDZ Technology”, are a prestigious organization engaged in trading and supplying a technologically advanced range of Card Printers & Software, Time Attendance, Smart Card Solutions, Scanners and ID Accessories. Under this range, we offer Card Printer/Encoder, High Definition Card Printer/Encoder, Direct to Card Printers/Encoders, Direct to Card Printers/Encoders, Industrial Card Printer/Encoder and Fargo High Definition Printing Technology, to name a few.

Mission: Become the foremost supplier of PVC card solutions by putting the needs of the clients first. Through consultation, planning and designing together, support our client base with cost-effective and fitting solutions.

Vision: To exceed the customer expectations by providing highest quality of products and services. To implement the best business practices to achieve customer satisfaction through highly motivated well trained and professional team.

Vendor Base: Owing to the untiring efforts of our procuring agents, we have been able to establish close alliances with some of the coherent manufacturers in the industry. Selected after strict examination process, these vendors put in their untiring efforts to deliver a quality-approved range of products at our end.

Our Team: Procuring agents Engineers Quality controllers R & D professionals Sales & marketing professionals

Quality Assurance: Being a quality-conscious organization, our foremost objective is to provide the customers with a quality-approved range of Card Printers & Software, Time Attendance, Smart Card Solutions, Scanners and ID Accessories. For this, we have associated ourselves with some of the coherent manufacturers in the industry who employ modern machinery and genuine tools during the manufacturing process.
